message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but that price is a bit high for me.  Would you consider $80?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can do $105, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice.  How about we split the difference and make it $90?
I can do $95, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm not sure I can go any lower.
